title: Self-Directed Mathematics Problem Design Project Utilizing Reusable Learning Objects (RLOs)

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of elementary math concepts (operations, geometry, measurement, etc.) and basic LMS management skills
context.additional_context: Conducted as smartphone-based mobile learning, emphasizing hands-on experience in creating educational content and developing problems using RLOs (Reusable Learning Objects)

learning_goals: Learners can derive at least three mathematical problem-solving strategies by analyzing RLOs.
Learners can design at least five customized elementary mathematics education problems by combining given RLOs.
Learners can provide feedback through peer review to improve the educational effectiveness of developed problems by over 80%.

resources: OER (Open Educational Resources) platform access permissions
RLO (Reusable Learning Object) authoring tool within LMS
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
